Name: The Bird Is The Word No. 2
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A grappa-based Last Word by way of Denmark.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2009/10 Mikael Melzer Nilsson while a bar manager at Salon 39 in Copenhagen, Denmark. See: Last Word history
Nutrition: One serving of The Bird Is The Word No. 2 contains 137 calories
